last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 6
last_episode_to_air.overview: Dawn French hosts a variety show featuring some of the world's most talented children, including a young opera singer, a circus strongman, a group of soul singers and Spain's biggest pop stars under four foot tall. Last in the series.

name: Little Big Shots
overview: British version of the reality competition that shines the spotlight on some of the world's most talented children.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Featuring a nine-year-old Kung Fu warrior, a pocket sized piano maestro and a Filipino internet sensation.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Dawn samples ice cream courtesy of one little confectioner who flies in from India. Later she finds herself breakdancing with world class B-girls and being wowed by David Bowie's littlest fan. But Dawn meets her match when she takes on a nine-year-old speed boxer.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Dawn French gets tricked by a little big magician, outsmarted by a 5-year-old member of Mensa, whipped into shape by a 9-year-old personal trainer and instructed by a super-sassy 7-year-old dancer from North Carolina.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: In this edition, Dawn breaks the 'never work with children or animals' rule when a little big shepherd and his sheep pay her a visit, a 13-year-old tap dancer demonstrates why he is a six-time world champion, and Dawn plays Maria Von Trapp to 11 world champion street dancers.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: In this edition, Dawn breaks the 'never work with children or animals' rule when a little big shepherd and his sheep pay her a visit, a 13-year-old tap dancer demonstrates why he is a six-time world champion, and Dawn plays Maria Von Trapp to 11 world champion street dancers.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: In the final episode, Dawn is dazzled by Sapphire, a 13-year-old pop star with a fan base of millions. She also has fun with tap dancing twins Freddie and Teddie from LA, and is tested at her cup stacking skills by a ten-year-old super-speed stacker. Finally, a fun-sized George Formby takes Dawn back in time to teach her a thing or two on the ukulele.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: This edition's sparkling line-up includes astonishing singing trio the TNT Boys, while dynamic doggy duo Will and Aston bring some dog agility chaos!

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Dawn French welcomes a new line-up of tiny talent, including the UK's youngest town crier, sassy Spanish flamenco dancers, the amazing artistry of a US string trio and six-year-old Max from Rochdale, who wants to be a surgeon.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Talent show presented by Dawn French. This episode features another fun and eclectic mix of tiny talent and knowledgeable kids dancing, cycling...and chicken racing!

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Dawn French is joined by another unbelievable line-up of young talent including wise-cracking pizza tossers, a pair of Irish ninjas and an incredible blind Scottish pianist.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Dawn French presents another thrilling line-up of tiny talent including a Bavarian magician, a guitar god in the making and a cheeky 3-year-old who has claims the title "Youngest Ever Little Big Shot".

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Dawn French hosts a variety show featuring some of the world's most talented children, including a young opera singer, a circus strongman, a group of soul singers and Spain's biggest pop stars under four foot tall. Last in the series.
